Package jMidiSequencerBeta.model

Interface IjMidiComposition

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    JMidiComposition
    public interface IjMidiComposition
    The Interface Represents an interface of a collection of MIDI Tracks that can be played in sync.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void decTempo()
      Decreases the tempo by 10000 micro seconds.
      java.util.ArrayList<JMidiEvent> getEventsOnTick​(int tick)
      Returns a list of elements in the designated tick
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,JMidiEvent>> getGrid()
      Returns a clone of the grid of the composition.
      int getMaxPitch()
      Returns a the maximum pitch in the track.
      int getMaxTick()
      Returns the maximum tick in the track.
      SectorType getSectorType​(int tick, int pitch)
      Returns the type of sector in an specific position of the grid.
      int getTempo()
      Returns a the tempo of the composition.
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,JMidiTrack> getTracks()
      Returns a clone of the tracks in the composition.
      void incTempo()
      Increases the tempo by 10000 micro seconds.

      • getEventsOnTick

        java.util.ArrayList<JMidiEvent> getEventsOnTick​(int tick)
        Returns a list of elements in the designated tick
        Parameters:
        tick - the tick where the events are.

      • getSectorType

        SectorType getSectorType​(int tick,
                         int pitch)
        Returns the type of sector in an specific position of the grid.
        Parameters:
        tick - the tick where the sector is.
        pitch - the pitch where the sector is.
